fast & quick service but very very steep price of $38 for 2 keys ( padlock key and main door key) both are your regular metal keys.

Better off to go elsewhere if you have time

Life saver! Came just in time 8.29pm and the owner was so kind to help me duplicate my 5 keys. Highly recommend. In case you couldn‚Äôt find this place so easily (like me, I was lost), I attach a few photos.

It is in between Pets station and Koo Kee!
